data.message: Am i the only one thats annoyed that the Santa on the truck dosent wink anymore ?

replies.message: Hi Jade, the ad has been on screens for twenty-two years but we have to admit that Santa has actually never winked at the end of the commercial. With or without Santa’s wink, we can confirm that the holidays are indeed coming and the festive season has officially begun.
Must have been my childhood imagination then! 😂 im sure i remember him winking at the kid as the kids runs towards the truck right at the end xxx
It's not xmas till the coca cola advert is on!
My bad!! Santa on the back of the truck usually raises his Coke bottle to the kid, but he doesn't do it this year :(

Jade Weeks They've edited a lot out of the advert. I mean they used to whisper holidays are coming about 20 times before they got into the song. That's not there anymore. My mum misses that too. She says it's not as exciting anymore. I agree with her!

Jade Weeks I always thought he winked too I even sat and watched the YouTube videos trying to prove this but can't clarify that he does 😕 however he did give the wee lad a bottle and did some movement
We watched a wide range of adverts and he did use to raise his bottle at the kiddy running after the truck xxx
Yip and it looked like a wink either way that bit needs to come back lol xx

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=ADZIr5HTU_M

Everyone thinks he winked, I always thought he shushed the child. XD
